<template>
  <nav class="footer__display-tasks">
    <input
        type="radio"
        id="all"
        v-model="currentFilter"
        value="all"
        class="footer__display-tasks--hide"
    >
    <label for="all" class="footer__display-tasks--visible">All</label>
    <!-- Аналогично для active/completed -->
  </nav>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: ['value'],
  computed: {
    currentFilter: {
      get() { return this.value },
      set(val) { this.$emit('input', val) }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.footer__display-tasks {
  display: flex;
  gap: 10px;
}
.footer__display-tasks--visible {
  padding: 3px 10px;
  border-radius: 10px;
}
.footer__display-tasks--hide:checked + .footer__display-tasks--visible {
  border: 1px solid rgba(127, 75, 19, 0.42);
}
</style>
